text.text_translated:
In the past, new machines and better health helped people. Fewer children died young. So, the number of people in the world grew very fast. Families became large. These large families had more children. These children also lived and had their own children.

But in the 1960s, people could get contraception. This is a special thing to stop having babies. So, women had fewer babies. The number of babies went down from six to two. This happened all over the world.

best_attempt.text_translated:
In the past, new machines and better health helped people. Fewer children died young. This made the world's population grow very fast. Families became large. These large families had more children. These children also lived and had their own children.

But in the 1960s, people could get contraception. This is medicine to stop having babies. So, women had fewer babies. Before, women had six babies on average. Now, they have two babies on average. This happened all over the world.
